name: The Pit (itch) (jamnoodle)
description:
This is an (attempted) project knocked together for the LRJ-2017. Crafted in Unity, and using a couple of extra resources (for AI tree nodes), it's the first game jam entry that I've ever made (I can have my life back now).

Note: It's got a bit of blood in there. So if that offends you, I wouldn't play it.

To control the character:

- Arrow keys to move (up, down, left or right)

- Left CTRL to attack

Pickups:

- Pick up armour to give yourself a little extra defence against your attackers

- Pick up chicken legs to replenish your health

Enjoy! Maybe.
